on_boarding_sub_title1: Easily search for any home and select your own search options

on_boarding_sub_title3: ease in participating in real estate auctions as a bidder or buyer

policy_topic:
Privacy Policy for Wevr

Wevr is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use,and share your personal information when you use our mobile application.What Information We Collect We collect the following types of information from you:

 • Personal Information: We collect personal information that you provide to us when you use our App, such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment information.
 • Property Information: We collect information about the properties that you search for, view, and inquire about, including the type of property, price, location, and other specifications.
 • Usage Information: We collect information about how you use our App, including your device type, operating system, browser type, IP address, and the pages you visit.

How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and improve our App, respond to your inquiries, and send you updates about our services. We also use your information for the following purposes:
 • Property Search and Recommendations: We use your property information to help you find properties that meet your needs and preferences. 
 • Virtual Tours and High-Quality Pictures: We use your personal information to provide you with virtual tours and high-quality pictures of properties that you are interested in.
 • Nearby Services: We use your location information to show you nearby services that are relevant to the properties you are interested in, such as schools, shops, and restaurants.
 • Online Auction: We use your personal information to provide you with a secure online auction service.

How We Share Your Information We may share your personal information with third-party service providers that help us provide and improve our App, such as hosting providers, payment processors, and customer support providers. We may also share your information as required by law or to protect our legal rights.

Security of Your Information
We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure.

Children's Privacy Our App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13, and we do not knowingly collect information from children under the age of 13.

Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and we will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on our website.

Contact Us
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.
